MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the ML3 postcode area of Hamilton, affecting properties in Neilsland Street and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8.23pm. Our engineers have arrived on site at the Buchan Substation and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.17pm on Sunday 10th January 2021.
